definitions.text: an adult female person (as opposed to a man)
examples: the woman kept house while the man hunted

definitions.text: a female person who plays a significant role (wife or mistress or girlfriend) in the life of a particular man
examples: he was faithful to his woman

definitions.text: a human female employed to do housework
examples: the char will clean the carpet
I have a woman who comes in four hours a day while I write
it's an insult to American womanhood
woman is the glory of creation
the fair sex gathered on the veranda
